snippet.title: Captain.tv | Slipstream! A New Streamer-led Game Coming to the Captain Hub!
snippet.description:
Developed by indie game studio Subpixel, Slipstream is a space survival game where the streamer takes command of a spaceship and the community makes up the crew. 

Work together to explore space, battle enemies, and upgrade your ship in this rogue-lite game coming soon to Captain.tv. 

For more info visit https://twitter.com/playslipstream
